articles.author: Tom Scotson
articles.title: I've found £200 of Christmas presents by searching through bins - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rachael Collins from Preston, Lancashire, goes searching through bins twice a week looking for presents that she usually either sells, gives to friends or keeps for herself and son Charlie, seven.
articles.content:
A mother claims the cost of living crisis has forced her to trawl through bins outside shops in order to give her family a proper Christmas - and has found £200 worth of presents.
